name: Seifuku Densetsu Pretty Fighter X
overview: Seifuku Densetsu: Pretty Fighter X is the sequel to Seifuku Densetsu: Pretty Fighter. The game features four new characters: Sorami Shizaki, Shizuka Minakami, Tokiko Tsuchiya and Maria Christel (the final boss), for a total of twelve characters. The visuals have been completely revamped, with the sprites having a more digitized hand drawn look. Also, taking advantage of the CD-ROM format, the game includes FMV for the introduction and ending sequences of each character. Game modes available are Story Mode, Versus mode and Team Play mode.
